title: CERIUM BASED PARTICLES, PROCESS FOR PRODUCING THE SAME AND USES THEREOF IN POLISHING

samples.experiment_context: Synthesis of pure cerium oxide particles with protrusions. Corresponds to Example 1 in patent US 2023/0041600 A1.

abrasive_synthesis.description: Synthesis of cerium oxide particles with controlled surface morphology via precipitation and thermal treatment.

chemical.description: Precipitation reaction. Molar ratio (NH₄OH/total Ce) - (NO₃⁻/CeIII) = 1.1. CeIV/total Ce molar ratio = 0.

physical.description: Controlled precipitation under N₂ atmosphere initially, followed by thermal treatment.

process_stages.process_description: Mixing cerium nitrate solution with ammonia solution at ambient temperature under N₂ bubbling.

slurry_preparation.description: Aqueous dispersion prepared for CMP testing.

characterization.description: Characterization of synthesized CeO₂ particles from Example 1.

cmp_performance.description: CMP performance on amorphous silica substrate.

samples.experiment_context: Synthesis of pure cerium oxide particles with protrusions. Higher HNO₃ concentration compared to Ex1. Corresponds to Example 2 in patent US 2023/0041600 A1.

abrasive_synthesis.description: Synthesis of cerium oxide particles with controlled surface morphology via precipitation and thermal treatment.

chemical.description: Precipitation reaction. Molar ratio (NH₄OH/total Ce) - (NO₃⁻/CeIII) = 1.1. CeIV/total Ce molar ratio = 0.

characterization.description: Characterization of synthesized CeO₂ particles from Example 2.

cmp_performance.description: CMP performance on amorphous silica substrate. (RR data not explicitly in Table 1 for Ex2, but implied to be tested).

samples.experiment_context: Synthesis of Ce/La mixed oxide particles with protrusions. Corresponds to Example 6 in patent US 2023/0041600 A1.

abrasive_synthesis.description: Synthesis of Ce/La mixed oxide particles with controlled surface morphology via precipitation and thermal treatment.

chemical.description: Precipitation reaction. Molar ratio (NH₄OH/total (Ce+La)) - (NO₃⁻/CeIII) = 0.93. CeIV/total Ce molar ratio = 0. La/(La+Ce) molar ratio approx 0.025 (calculated from quantities, 0.36kg La(NO3)3 vs 13.8kg Ce(NO3)3, assuming similar molar masses for simplicity of estimation here, actual ratio is (0.36/M_La(NO3)3) / ((0.36/M_La(NO3)3) + (13.8/M_Ce(NO3)3))). Table 1 states 97.5/2.5 Ce/La.

M_Ce_M_ratio.details: Target 2.5% La doping (97.5/2.5 Ce/La from Table 1)

physical.description: Controlled precipitation under N₂ atmosphere initially, followed by thermal treatment.

slurry_preparation.description: Aqueous dispersion prepared for CMP testing.

characterization.description: Characterization of synthesized Ce/La mixed oxide particles from Example 6.
